title: Add SSL support for RabbitMQ Communication

comments.content: Add SSL support for RabbitMQ Communication for sending messages securely.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content: Josh: This one is easy.  Just add a rabbit_use_ssl boolean flag defaulting to False.  Then where rabbit_host, etc is passed in Connection(), you'll add a: ssl=FLAGS.rabbit_use_ssl  to the params dict or whatever.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens
